attributes.action: Punish parents of children who disrupt school lessons by handing out fines.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A lot of parents are not bothered about their child misbehaving at school, if they were fined then they would be concerned, and the child would be forced to behave. Also the money could be put back into the education system. Should parents be unemployer and recieving benefits, then they should be eligible for the amount to be deducted from their benefit payment.
